title: Yogi Adityanath: Agar ek Hindu ka khoon bahega, kam se kam 10 aise logon ki hatya karvayenge...
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
As part of a chilling documentary called ‘Saffron War – Radicalization of Hinduism’, Rajeev Yadav and Shahnawaz Alam of Rihai Manch documented the politics of hate that led to the riots in Easter Uttar Pradeshs’ Mau district in 2005, they recorded a Yogi Adityanath hate speech in which he claims that if one Hindu dies, then to avenge the death of one Hindu, they will not bother to file an FIR, but make sure that at least 10 ‘such people’ will be murdered…(and then the crowd erupts)

The above clip is part of this one-hour documentary which must be watched which shows the truth about Yogi Adityanath’s politics and his rise.

Yogi Adityanath’s other hate speech is documented here =>Yogi Adityanath’s Hate Speech – Agar woh ek Hindu to maarenge to 100 ko hum bhi…

For a complete story of Yogi Adityanath’s utterings, read our story =>The story of Yogi Adityanath’s journey.
